resources.string: I will now try to obtain a screenshot of the website you entered. Please be patient!
Your screenshot is now ready! Use the green rectangle to select the region of the website you want to show in your widget. When you\'re done, stop touching the screen and wait for a few seconds.
Only update widget(s) when WIFI ist turnt on.
Interval between widget updates in minutes.
If not left empty, this will be used as the base URL of the server to contact.
If not left empty, the server entered here wil be contacted for screenshots instead of kohaerenzstiftung.org.
